Package camzup.core

Class Entity2

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Entity
camzup.core.Entity2
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity, IOriented2, ISpatial2, IUtils
Direct Known Subclasses:
CamEntity2, CurveEntity2, MeshEntity2
public class Entity2 extends Entity implements IOriented2, ISpatial2
An entity in two dimensional space that can be moved around with a transform, but contains no other data. Useful when a 'target' entity is needed.

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity2

      public Entity2()
      The default constructor.

    • Entity2

      public Entity2(String name)
      Constructs a named entity. A new transform is created by the constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - the name

    • Entity2

      public Entity2(String name, Transform2 transform)
      Constructs a named entity with a transform. The transform is assigned by reference, and so it can be changed outside the entity.
      Parameters:
      name - the name
      transform - the transform

    • Entity2

      public Entity2(Transform2 transform)
      Constructs an entity with a transform. The transform is assigned by reference, and so it can be changed outside the entity.
      Parameters:
      transform - the transform
